import { CheckoutWrapper } from "../Styles/Modal-Style"; function CheckoutModal() { return( <>
MY CHECKOUT
{item.pname}

Price : {item.price} {item.pCategory === 'Electronics' ? '' : `(${item.unit})`}

handleDecrement(i)}>

{item.quantity}

{ e.stopPropagation() handleIncrement(i) }}>
); } export default CheckoutModal;
